verses.verse: And this is the blessing <WH1293>, wherewith Moses <WH4872> the man <WH376> of God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> before <WH6440> his death <WH4194>.

And he said <WH559>, Jehovah <WH3068> came <WH935> from Sinai <WH5514>, And rose <WH2224> from Seir <WH8165> unto them <WH3313>; He shined forth from mount <WH2022> Paran <WH6290>, And he came <WH857> from the ten thousands <WH7233> of holy ones <WH6944>: At his right hand <WH3225> was a fiery <WH799> law for them <WH1881>.

Yea <WH637>, he loveth <WH2245> the people <WH5971>; All his saints <WH6918> are in thy hand <WH3027>: And they sat down <WH8497> at thy feet <WH7272>; Every one shall receive <WH5375> of thy words <WH1703>.
Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> us a law <WH8451>, An inheritance <WH4181> for the assembly <WH6952> of Jacob <WH3290>.
And he was king <WH4428> in Jeshurun <WH3484>, When the heads <WH7218> of the people <WH5971> were gathered <WH622>, All the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> together <WH3162>.
Let Reuben <WH7205> live <WH2421>, and not die <WH4191>; Nor let his men <WH4962> be few <WH4557>.

And this is the blessing of Judah <WH3063>: and he said <WH559>, Hear <WH8085>, Jehovah <WH3068>, the voice <WH6963> of Judah <WH3063>, And bring <WH935> him in unto his people <WH5971>. With his hands <WH3027> he contended <WH7227> for himself <WH5828>; And thou shalt be a help against his adversaries <WH6862>.

And of Levi <WH3878> he said <WH559>, Thy Thummim <WH8550> and thy Urim <WH224> are with thy godly <WH2623> one <WH376>, Whom thou didst prove <WH5254> at Massah <WH4532>, With whom thou didst strive <WH7378> at the waters <WH4325> of Meribah <WH4809>;

Who said <WH559> of his father <WH1>, and of his mother <WH517>, I have not seen <WH7200> him <WH5234>; Neither did he acknowledge his brethren <WH251>, Nor knew <WH3045> he his own children <WH1121>: For they have observed <WH8104> thy word <WH565>, And keep <WH5341> thy covenant <WH1285>.

They shall teach <WH3384> Jacob <WH3290> thine ordinances <WH4941>, And Israel <WH3478> thy law <WH8451>: They shall put <WH7760> incense <WH6988> before <WH639> thee <WH3632>, And whole burnt-offering upon thine altar <WH4196>.

Bless <WH1288>, Jehovah <WH3068>, his substance <WH2428>, And accept <WH7521> the work <WH6467> of his hands <WH3027>: Smite <WH4272> through the loins <WH4975> of them that rise <WH6965> up against him <WH8130>, And of them that hate him <WH6965>, that they rise not <WH4480> again <WH6965>.

Of Benjamin <WH1144> he said <WH559>, The beloved <WH3039> of Jehovah <WH3068> shall dwell <WH7931> in safety <WH983> by him <WH2653>; He covereth him all the day <WH3117> long <WH7931>, And he dwelleth between his shoulders <WH3802>.

And of Joseph <WH3130> he said <WH559>, Blessed <WH1288> of Jehovah <WH3068> be his land <WH776>, For the precious things <WH4022> of heaven <WH8064>, for the dew <WH2919>, And for the deep <WH8415> that coucheth beneath <WH7257>,
And for the precious <WH4022> things of the fruits <WH8393> of the sun <WH8121>, And for the precious things <WH4022> of the growth <WH1645> of the moons <WH3391>,
And for the chief things <WH7218> of the ancient <WH6924> mountains <WH2042>, And for the precious things <WH4022> of the everlasting <WH5769> hills <WH1389>,

And for the precious things <WH4022> of the earth <WH776> and the fulness <WH4393> thereof <WH7522>, And the good will of him that dwelt <WH7931> in the bush <WH5572>. Let the blessing come <WH935> upon the head <WH7218> of Joseph <WH3130>, And upon the crown of the head <WH6936> of him that was separate <WH5139> from his brethren <WH251>.

The firstling <WH1060> of his herd <WH7794>, majesty <WH1926> is his <WH7161>; And his horns are the horns <WH7161> of the wild-ox <WH7214>: With them he shall push <WH5055> the peoples <WH5971> all <WH3162> of them <WH657>, even the ends of the earth <WH776>: And they are the ten thousands <WH7233> of Ephraim <WH669>, And they are the thousands <WH505> of Manasseh <WH4519>.
And of Zebulun <WH2074> he said <WH559>, Rejoice <WH8055>, Zebulun <WH2074>, in thy going out <WH3318>; And <WH3485>, Issachar, in thy tents <WH168>.

They shall call <WH7121> the peoples <WH5971> unto the mountain <WH2022>; There shall they offer <WH2076> sacrifices <WH2077> of righteousness <WH6664>: For they shall suck <WH3243> the abundance <WH8228> of the seas <WH3220>, And the hidden <WH2934> treasures <WH8226> of the sand <WH2344>.

And of Gad <WH1410> he said <WH559>, Blessed <WH1288> be he that enlargeth <WH7337> Gad <WH1410>: He dwelleth <WH7931> as a lioness <WH3833>, And teareth <WH2963> the arm <WH2220>, yea <WH637>, the crown of the head <WH6936>.

And he provided <WH7200> the first part <WH7225> for himself <WH2710>, For there was the lawgiver's portion <WH2513> reserved <WH5603>; And he came <WH857> with the heads <WH7218> of the people <WH5971>; He executed <WH6213> the righteousness <WH6666> of Jehovah <WH3068>, And his ordinances <WH4941> with Israel <WH3478>.
And of Dan <WH1835> he said <WH559>, Dan <WH1835> is a lion <WH738>'s whelp <WH1482>, That leapeth <WH2187> forth from Bashan <WH1316>.

And of Naphtali <WH5321> he said <WH559>, O Naphtali <WH5321>, satisfied <WH7649> with favor <WH7522>, And full <WH4392> with the blessing <WH1293> of Jehovah <WH3068>, Possess <WH3423> thou the west <WH3220> and the south <WH1864>.

And of Asher <WH836> he said <WH559>, Blessed <WH1288> be Asher <WH836> with children <WH1121>; Let him be acceptable <WH7521> unto his brethren <WH251>, And let him dip <WH2881> his foot <WH7272> in oil <WH8081>.
Thy bars <WH4515> shall be iron <WH1270> and brass <WH5178>; And as thy days <WH3117>, so shall thy strength be <WH1679>.
There is none like unto God <WH410>, O Jeshurun <WH3484>, Who rideth <WH7392> upon the heavens <WH8064> for thy help <WH5828>, And in his excellency <WH1346> on the skies <WH7834>.

The eternal <WH6924> God <WH430> is thy dwelling-place <WH4585>, And underneath are the everlasting <WH5769> arms <WH2220>. And he thrust out <WH1644> the enemy <WH341> from before <WH6440> thee <WH559>, And said, Destroy <WH8045>.

And Israel <WH3478> dwelleth <WH7931> in safety <WH983>, The fountain <WH5869> of Jacob <WH3290> alone <WH910>, In a land <WH776> of grain <WH1715> and new wine <WH8492>; Yea <WH8064>, his heavens drop down <WH6201> dew <WH2919>.

Happy <WH835> art thou <WH3478>, O Israel: Who is like unto thee <WH5971>, a people saved <WH3467> by Jehovah <WH3068>, The shield <WH4043> of thy help <WH5828>, And the sword <WH2719> of thy excellency <WH1346>! And thine enemies <WH341> shall submit <WH3584> themselves unto thee <WH1869>; And thou shalt tread upon their high places <WH1116>.
